sentences.en: A long drum , bongo close square yuan contributory goods and materials.
sentences.cn: 长鼓、小鼓等近方元的捐助物资.

sentences.en: Alcohol is a contributory factor in 10% of all road accidents.
sentences.cn: 所有交通事故中有10%是酒后驾车造成的。

sentences.en: As contributory old, incomplete numbers, some blouses, sandals and other goods shot low prices.
sentences.cn: 由于款式陈旧 、 号码不全, 一些短衫 、 凉鞋等商品都打出了低廉的价格.

sentences.en: Cervical ripening was a contributory factor in the mode of cephalic delivery.
sentences.cn: 结论:宫颈成熟度评分对头位分娩方式有一定提示作用.

sentences.en: Contributory to the development of our plant and customers is the source the original!
sentences.cn: 重视款式的开发是我厂与客户的源原!

sentences.en: In most states contributory negligence has been superceded by comparative negligence.
sentences.cn: 在多数州,混合过失已经被比较过失取代.

sentences.en: MRI is contributory to the diagnosis and treatment in patients with carpal tunnel syndrome.
sentences.cn: 结论:MRI对腕管综合征的诊断及治疗方式的选择有重要的意义.

sentences.en: Over the young people like to wear the various contributory fashion and pop plainclothes.
sentences.cn: 工作之余,年轻人则喜欢穿款式流行的各种时装和便装.

sentences.en: Poor organization was certainly a contributory factor to the crisis.
sentences.cn: 组织不善肯定是导致危机的因素之一.

sentences.en: Salvation is a totally non contributory gift.
sentences.cn: 救恩是一项完全不加功劳的礼物.

sentences.en: Smoking is a contributory factor in lung cancer.
sentences.cn: 抽烟是导致肺癌的一个因素。

sentences.en: The court made a finding of contributory negligence.
sentences.cn: 法庭作出判决认定受害方犯有共同过失.

sentences.en: The latter is free but the former is contributory.
sentences.cn: 人寿保险是免费的,但养老金是由雇员和雇主共同分担的.

sentences.en: The plaintiff was guilty of contributory negligence for failing to wear a crash helmet.
sentences.cn: 原告因未戴安全头盔而负有连带责任.

sentences.en: We now know that repressing anger is a contributory factor in many physical illnesses.
sentences.cn: 现在我们知道压制自己的愤怒是导致许多身体疾病的因素之一。

sentences.en: Your carelessness was a contributory cause of the fire.
sentences.cn: 你的粗心大意是造成火灾的原因之一.

words.tran_cn: 出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的
捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的

trans.tran_cn: 促成的，促进的，起作用的，需要受益人付钱的
trans.tran_en: being one of the causes of a particular result
